textAfterTable: adserver.adtech.de cfp Checks to see if you accept cookies http://www.adtechus.com/cookie_opt-out/ 2 - ANALYTIC COOKIES These cookies collect anonymous information about how visitors use our Website to help us improve the way the website works. These Cookies will: Provide statistics on how our Website has been used Measure any errors on our Website and support improvements and test new designs These Cookies will not: Gather information that could be used for marketing Retarget advertising to you on other websites Our Cookies Cookie Name Cookie Description JSESSIONID This tells us you are actively using our site. This way we can always know, at any given time, how many users we have visiting. userid Tracks your encrypted user id when logged in s_sq Lets us know the previous link that you clicked on JSEESSIONID This tells us if you are actively using our site to enable us to know how many users we have visiting our site ASP.NET_Sessionid Creates a temporary user session ID for blogs. AuthorizationCookie Creates a encrypted User ID when you log in s_vi This provides us with a unique visor ID time and date stamp ASP.NET_Sessionid This provides us with a user session ID for 40winks and Tickles Third Party Cookies
